title: Missionary position
summary: The missionary position or man-on-top position is a sex position in which, generally, a woman lies on her back and a man lies on top of her while they face each other and engage in vaginal intercourse.[1][2][3] The position may also be used for other sexual activity, such as anal sex.[2] It is commonly associated with heterosexual sexual activity, but is also used by same-sex couples.[2]
